title: A Beard in Nepal 2: Return to the Village
description: 'A Beard In Nepal 2' Return to the Village' tells the story of Fiona and Tod's second visit to the small, isolated village of Salle, situated high in the remote Everest Region of Nepal.We follow the couple from Liverpool as they meet up again with the villagers and children, and with Kalyani, the young junior school headmistress.They travel with Kalyani along some of the highest and most dangerous roads in the world, as she takes them to see her new village, hidden away in a stunning, secluded valley in the Himalayas.Following on from the success of 'A Beard In Nepal' this, their second book, is full of hair raising adventures, humour and comic escapades."....excellent follow up to the first book....""....highly recommended read....""....Sequels are a tricky thing to pull off but Fiona does so with brio!...."
author: Fiona  Roberts
